items.title: DOJ probe into Powell sparks backlash from some Republicans, former Fed chairs
items.description: A bipartisan group of top economic officials called the DOJ probe into Jerome Powell an "unprecedented attempt" to undermine the Fed's independence.

items.title: Allegiant Air to acquire Sun Country Airlines in $1.5B deal
items.description: Allegiant Air says it will acquire Sun Country Airlines in a cash-and-stock deal valued at about $1.5 billion

items.title: WATCH:  Guide dog and vision-impaired owner are on a travel mission
items.description: ABC News' Danny New reports on two best pals who are turning heads at National Parks across the country -- one on two legs.
